Don't they know where photos are kept by photographers? -- Andrzej http://lowflyingbananas.zenfolio.com/ What gives? Who keeps their photo collection on the small internal drive of your Mac or PC? I just went online to order it, but to my amazement and after reading the reviews, I find out that it does not search external drives. A while ago DPReview posted an ACDsee announcement here about special sale on Duplicate Finder. http://www.dpreview.com/news/2011/12/14/ACDsystemsapps
